Hi! I'm Daniel James Miller.

I am a neuroscientist and graduate student at Vanderbilt University. I am interested in evolutionary biology and quantitative anatomy, and a fan of beers, books, and good conversation.

Prolonged myelination in human neocortical evolution

Jun 16, 2014 â€¢ Miller et al.

This paper explores some of the underlying neuroanatomical differences in the development of the human brain compared to our closest living genetic relative, the chimpanzee, and how these changes may be related to human cognition and health.

Prolonged Myelination

This paper explores some of the underlying neuroanatomical differences in the development of the human brain compared to our closest living genetic relative, the chimpanzee, and how these changes may be related to human cognition and health.
